H0.text: The name of which Russian spacecraft means 'travelling companion' or 'satellite'. Kosmos

H1.text: The name of which Russian spacecraft means 'travelling companion' or 'satellite'. Zond

H2.text: The name of which Russian spacecraft means 'travelling companion' or 'satellite'. Luna

H3.text: The name of which Russian spacecraft means 'travelling companion' or 'satellite'. Sputnik

A4.text: Sputnik 1 was the first artificial satellite, launched October 1957.

A5.text: Sputnik (rocket), an unmanned orbital carrier rocket derived from the R-7 Semyorka ICBM
